description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员，曾被中共中央社会部派遣至台湾从事谍报活动。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, a member of the Chinese Communist Party, who was sent to Taiwan by the Central Social Affairs Department of the CCP to engage in espionage activities.

description.zh-cn: 中国的著名高等学府。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher education in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

en: Central Investigation Department of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1955年至1983年间主管情报、反谍和政治保卫工作的机构。
description.en: The agency of the Communist Party of China responsible for intelligence, counter-espionage, and political security from 1955 to 1983.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级将领，长期负责情报和特务工作，曾任中共中央社会部部长。
description.en: A senior general of the Chinese Communist Party, long responsible for intelligence and secret service work, who served as the head of the Central Social Affairs Department of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中共地下党员，被中共中央社会部派遣至台湾从事谍报活动。
description.en: An underground member of the Chinese Communist Party, sent to Taiwan by the Central Social Affairs Department of the CCP for espionage activities.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国时期的一场政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 北京大学国际关系学院

description.zh-cn: 被中共中央社会部派遣至台湾的特工。
description.en: An agent sent to Taiwan by the Central Social Affairs Department of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 被中共中央社会部派遣至台湾的特工。
description.en: An agent sent to Taiwan by the Central Social Affairs Department of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 萧明华的兄长，在重庆期间结识朱芳春。
description.en: Xiao Minghua's older brother, who met Zhu Fangchun in Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 曾协助中共特工朱芳春潜逃。
description.en: Assisted CCP agent Zhu Fangchun in his escape.

description.zh-cn: 曾协助中共特工朱芳春潜逃。
description.en: Assisted CCP agent Zhu Fangchun in his escape.

nodes.id: 四川松潘边区职业学校

zh-cn: 四川松潘边区职业学校

nodes.id: 中国国际贸易促进委员会

zh-cn: 中国国际贸易促进委员会

description.zh-cn: 朱芳春1911年腊月生于直隶省藁城县黄庄村。
description.en: Zhu Fangchun was born in Huangzhuang Village, Gaocheng County, Zhili Province in December 1911.

description.zh-cn: 1933年考入国立北平师范大学，获教育系心理学专业兼国文系双学士学位。
description.en: Admitted to National Beiping Normal University in 1933, and obtained a double bachelor's degree in psychology from the Department of Education and the Department of Chinese Language.

description.zh-cn: 大学期间加入共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party during his university years.

description.zh-cn: 1948年中共中央社会部部长李克农派遣朱芳春赴台发展组织。
description.en: In 1948, Li Kenong, the head of the Central Social Affairs Department of the CCP, dispatched Zhu Fangchun to Taiwan to develop organizations.

description.zh-cn: 朱芳春吸收萧明华加入共产党，并在台湾的谍报小组中领导她，萧明华负责情报搜集、保管、密写工作。
description.en: Zhu Fangchun recruited Xiao Minghua into the Communist Party and led her in the espionage group in Taiwan, where Xiao was responsible for intelligence collection, safekeeping, and secret writing.

description.zh-cn: 1947年7月，朱芳春策反北平驻军被傅作义发觉并遭到通缉。
description.en: In July 1947, Zhu Fangchun's efforts to subvert the Beiping garrison were discovered by Fu Zuoyi, who then issued a warrant for his arrest.

description.zh-cn: 1948年由中共中央社会部派遣来台从事谍报活动。
description.en: In 1948, he was dispatched by the Central Social Affairs Department of the CCP to Taiwan to engage in espionage activities.

description.zh-cn: 来台后，朱芳春利用讲习成立读书会，并在此基础上成立了“台湾青年解放同盟”。
description.en: After arriving in Taiwan, Zhu Fangchun used lectures to form study groups, which became the basis for establishing the 'Taiwan Youth Liberation Alliance'.

description.zh-cn: 来台后，朱芳春利用讲习成立读书会，并在此基础上成立了“新民主主义青年团”。
description.en: After arriving in Taiwan, Zhu Fangchun used lectures to form study groups, which became the basis for establishing the 'New Democratic Youth League'.

description.zh-cn: 文革时，朱芳春下放河北省正定中学担任教师，遭到无情的批斗。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Zhu Fangchun was sent down to teach at Zhengding Middle School in Hebei Province and was subjected to relentless struggle sessions.

description.zh-cn: 1945年抗战胜利后，朱芳春兼任天津女子师范学院教育系主任。
description.en: After the victory of the Anti-Japanese War in 1945, Zhu Fangchun also served as the head of the Education Department at Tianjin Women's Normal College.

description.zh-cn: 1979年获得平反，任教于北京国际关系学院，1993年退休。
description.en: He was rehabilitated in 1979 and taught at the University of International Relations in Beijing until his retirement in 1993.

description.zh-cn: 朱芳春在重庆期间结识萧明柱、萧明华兄妹。
description.en: Zhu Fangchun met the siblings Xiao Mingzhu and Xiao Minghua while in Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 1950年，朱芳春透过田子彬办理谍报证顺利通关，潜逃香港。
description.en: In 1950, with the help of Tian Zibin, Zhu Fangchun obtained an espionage certificate to pass through customs and escape to Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 1950年，朱芳春透过白静寅办理谍报证顺利通关，潜逃香港。
description.en: In 1950, with the help of Bai Jingyin, Zhu Fangchun obtained an espionage certificate to pass through customs and escape to Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 1950年朱芳春逃返大陆后，协助土地改革运动。
description.en: After fleeing back to mainland China in 1950, Zhu Fangchun assisted in the Land Reform Movement.
